Docs.summary: Gets or sets the conversation query traversal mode. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange startingwith Exchange Server 2013.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the view filter specifying the type of items to return. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
